Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Molecular genetic analysis of her VLCAD gene revealed a T1372C ( F458L ) missense mutation and a 1668 ACAG 1669 splice site mutation .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| VLCAD (Very Long Chain Acyl-CoA Dehydrogenase) deficiency |

The paragraph mentions "her VLCAD gene" which indicates a genetic condition related to the VLCAD gene. VLCAD deficiency is a metabolic disorder characterized by the deficiency of the enzyme very long-chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase.

| VLCAD (Very Long Chain Acyl-CoA Dehydrogenation) deficiency |

The paragraph mentions "her VLCAD gene" which indicates a genetic condition related to the VLCAD gene. VLCAD deficiency is a metabolic disorder characterized by the deficiency of the enzyme very long-chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase. The specific mutations mentioned in the paragraph (T1372C and 1668 ACAG 1669) are related to this disease.
